description: Configuration for SSMS EnvTabs. Controls how query tabs are renamed and colored based on server/database connection.

documentation.enableAutoRename: If true, only 'SQLQueryX.sql' tabs will be renamed. Saved filenames will not be touched.
documentation.enableAutoColor: If true, tabs are colored based on the ColorIndex (0-15) matched below.
documentation.autoConfigure: Controls automatic rule creation for new connections. Values: 'off' (disabled), 'server' (group by server only), 'server db' (group by server and database).
documentation.enableConfigurePrompt: If true, asks if you want to edit the configuration file after a new rule is automatically added.
documentation.wildcards: Server/Database fields support SQL LIKE syntax (%) for wildcards.
documentation.priority: Rules are checked in Priority order (lowest number first). First match wins.

colors.Reference: Use these IDs in the 'colorIndex' field below.
